message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  I believe it will be very valuable to you.  I'm asking for $20,000, which reflects its true worth.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the product's value is significantly higher than your offer. I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $13,500 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
